attributes.comment:
RE: DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044

To whom it may concern -
We are in the process of adopting our 3rd daughter from China. We are very
disappointed to hear that there is a possibility that the fees for the biometrics and I-
600A may be increasing. With the current wait for a referral from China, not only
will be have to pay these fees once, but since they will expire prior to our referral &
travel, we will need to pay the fees twice. It is very costly to adopt internationally
and in order to encourage families to adopt, not increasing the fees would help
greatly.

I ask you to reconsider not only the fee increase, but also the expiration time for
these documents.

Thank you for your time,
Lisa DeVries

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lisa A. DeVries
